codeList:
...
standalone:
  container_name: milvus-standalone
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.5.16
...
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
docker compose ps
...
minio:
  container_name: milvus-minio
  image: minio/minio:RELEASE.2024-12-18T13-15-44Z

...
standalone:
  container_name: milvus-standalone
  image: milvusdb/milvus:v2.6.4
docker compose down
docker compose up -d
# Check container status
docker compose ps

# Check Milvus version
docker compose logs standalone | grep "version"
headingContent: Upgrade Milvus Standalone with Docker Compose

anchorList.label: 使用 Docker Compose 升級 Milvus 單機版
